title: Kind of Blue
description: Adam Walker feels like an outsider in his close-knit family and it is his own doing. For years he has hidden a secret from them. How can Adam confide in any of them when revealing his guilty pleasures will tear them apart?Nicola Evans arrives on Blue Mountain as the new marketing and events coordinator. She has a secret of her own. Yet, the woman with the pixie haircut and forest-green eyes does what no one else has managed to do - chip through all of Adamâ€™s defenses. Nicky is a temptation he cannot resist.But secrets cannot stay hidden forever. The truth always comes out. And when Adam faces the biggest challenge of his life, Nicky has a choice to make. Stay on to help him or leave with her secret intact.Will Nicky risk it all to help Adam break free from the chains of his past once and for all?
author: Francine Beaton
